fields.description: As a cloud user, I want a view of a single snapshot that will size well to different devices and show me information in a clear, easy to understand modeless view.

comments.body: I notice size and "time started" aren't shown and probably should be.

Time should be in 01:49:31 PM Dec 9th 2013 format.

I notice in layout.py;
        self.date_format = '%Y-%m-%d %H:%M %p'
        self.angular_date_format = 'yyyy-MM-dd h:mm a'

These formats should be localized.
If I try to add a tag, and the snapshot didn't have a description, the validation fails the request, yet I can't add a description because that field isn't editable.

This could be a tag editor problem, but I added a tag, then was forced to click "add tag". We used to accept "save changes" as taking whatever was entered for the tag. Users might get confused about this change.
Long tag names don't wrap (or truncate with ...) properly once the tag is added. It shows poorly in the grid and table view as well.
[~dkavanagh], Please reassign this (and all other issues like this) to me for UX review after you've done functional reivew, too! Thanks!
Assigning back to [~kgill] to make fixes mentioned by [~dkavanagh] just so I don't mention the same things. Thanks!
Fixes mentioned by [~dkavanagh] have not been addressed yet. Please fix those before assigning to me for UX review.

missing the following fields:
* size
* description
* time started

https://github.com/eucalyptus/koala/pull/103

also added volume create time to the single volume page.

* register snapshot button text should be "Register as image"

ALMOST THERE!!!!!!
